name: Plane Jam
description:
I made this on the plane home from San Francisco -> Minneapolis. It took 3 hours!

It's not really that much of a game, you can just click on passengers to see their age, and the name, but I didn't get time to make a name generator, so everyone is called "???". I could have done favorite color, but it would have just come in as an HSV value and that's not fun. :P

Use up and down arrow keys or W and S to navigate around the plane, and click on passengers to see their info.
